title: Strawberry jam millefeuille
description: Layers of light, golden pastry, creamy vanilla custard and home-made strawberry jam all topped with simple glacé icing. This cream slice makes a very special tea-time treat and is much easier to prepare than you might think.
ingredients: 400g/14oz fresh strawberries, hulled and finely sliced
½ vanilla pod, cut in half lengthways
2 tbsp icing sugar for dusting, extra for rolling
